actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Failed to Receive 2/3's Vote to Suspend and Pass by Yea-Nay Vote: 158 - 239 (Record Vote No: 271).

official_title: A bill to recognize the service of the former Speaker of the House by means of the Thomas P.  O'Neill Jr. Library.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education, in recognition of the service of the former Speaker of the House of Representatives, and in lieu of a grant for the preservation of his papers and records, to forgive the remaining debt obligation of the receiving institution with respect to the loan used to establish the Thomas P. O'Neill Jr. Library.

titles.title: A bill to recognize the service of the former Speaker of the House by means of the Thomas P.  O'Neill Jr. Library.
